channel.title: Crazy greaters
channel.description: hello it is again me :D with stupid questions .... [img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/8523/niced.png[/img] here is code for drop rate ....[code]<ItemDropDef> <id>521</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>1</weight> [/code] and alll greaters is droping ewerytime something .... if i put same code to KBD on dragon sword i was killed 20 and only then i get d sword ... so whats wrong with that greaters .... cant stop them from drops .... :) 521 code is for certificate and it is from 5 kils 5 drops :/
